title: The Far East - Music Pack
description: Eastern-themed music loops, tonal ambience and stings - atmospheric perfection!
longDescription:
Take the opportunity to supercharge your game's immersion, transporting players back to a simpler time full of loincloths and beheading. You know, the good old days.


The Far East is an audio pack full of everything you need to fill out the atmosphere and mood of your game - stings, tonal ambience loops, music, even a dynamic music battle track with three different levels of intensity.


Showcase Video

Fun Video
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Wav files
  • Includes both loops and events/stings
  • Includes both music and tonal ambience to set the mood
  • Dynamic music track included - have your engine play all 3 layers at once, but with layers 2 and 3 muted. When you want intensity raised, such as when the player loses significant health, crossfade from layer 1 to layer 2. Music will seamlessly transition to a more intense version of the same piece of music, playing at the same point in the track.

Number of Audio Wavs: 26

Number of Audio Cues: 26

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 18:25

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
